task.title: Create a Snapshot with the Console

step.cmd: Click the Create Snapshot link at the top of the Manage Snapshots screen. The Create Snapshot dialog box will appear.
If you would like to create a snapshot from an existing snapshot, select the snapshot from the Create from snapshot? drop-down listbox.
Enter the size of the snapshot in gigabytes in the Snapshot Size (GB) text box.

info.note: If you're creating a snapshot from a snapshot, you can't enter a snapshot size that's smaller than the original snapshot you've selected.

step.cmd: Select an availability zone from the Availability Zone drop-down list box.

info.note: You can only attach a snapshot to an instance in the same availability zone.
